tha-ap381:0.3_0: I practice absorption so hard to pass.
tha-ap381:1.4_0: he who stayed in front of him.
tha-ap381:2.2_0: as a consequence the slave of coat.
tha-ap381:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap381:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap381:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap381:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sumanā.
